item.title: Lockpicking
item.description:
Hay varios m√©todos y no existe un camino “correcto”:

  • Raking
  • Pick Guns
  • Bump Keys
  • Single Pin Picking

Usage of pick designed to manipulate individual pins and torque wrench to apply rotational force to plug Manufacturing irregularities within lock determine the pick order Classic hooko shaped pick will be used most frequently.

Single Pin Picking: Find the binding Pin.

  • Pins within a lock are pincked in a specific order: the picking order.

Lock Vulnerability: Manufacturing Tolerances
